name: Northern Realms
effect: Add 2 strength to each Gold unit when it appears on your side.

name: Scoia'tael
effect: Chose who begins one round per game.

name: Monsters
effect: At the end of each round, keep the last loyal non-Gold, non-Fleeting Neutral or Monsters unit played on your side of the battlefield.

name: Skellige
effect: At the start of Rounds 2 and 3, add 1 to the base strength of every non-Gold unit in your hand, deck, and graveyard.

name: Nilfgaard
effect: After drawing cards at the start of rounds 2 and 3, redraw up to 1 card in your hand.
